lines.text: It’s exactly what the effect of a Living Memory spell looks like!
The… the thing from the Stop Magic book.
The thing that projects an image of a moment frozen in time, according to how the caster remembers it?
Oh, right. That… thing I was paying attention to.
So that’s the spell, is it?
And we already know there’s a <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> involved, so that answers my other question.
‘’<c=#FF00FF>Where’d it come from?</c>’’ The Stop Wizard cast it, right?
Gotta be. I think we’re getting closer to cracking this one...
You said that spell can only be cast by a Stop Wizard, but there’s no one like that around.
Do you think it’s one of the dead bodies?
Maybe, but there could be some other explanation. The Stop Wizard could have run, or hid, or…
